Text:
Also, everyone who liked this game should knows about this site 
http://www.oni2.net/
There are a LOT of fanMods (Even a multiplayer, hell yea!) and a back-story for the game.
Also, all saves are keeped, in a file "persost.dat", which can easily be downloaded from the Internets

Also, if you are encountering awful bugs in this game (like "F*** Y**, your damn game dont starting") or want to improve graphics tp 1920x1080 (of course, you do) you should install C-Daodan DLL from this link
http://wiki.oni2.net/Daodan_DLL
Yeah, this is repalcement of "binkw32.dll". It also adds many upgrades in the game for skilled players ^:3 
Have fun!)))

Keep this torrent alive!

This game is a Classic unfamous gem!
I should have mentioned this in the summary, but the C-Daodan Dll  + patched executable and instructions for installation are included in the torrent, as well as links the the community sites
nevermind, the program I used to make the torrent removed that folder. :(
